title: marhaba Surprises: Bringing Joy to Travel
text: Tweet It is always heart warming to see brands go out of their way to bring joy to people’s lives. Recently, marhaba from Dubai ran a competition and selected 3 winners based on their personal stories and threw them a huge surprise at the Dubai airport. Each winner from a different country and from a different walk of life was pleasantly surprised when they landed at the Dubai airport. Watch these 3 gorgeous surprises through these 3 short videos. Winner 1 This was Noreen surprising her fiancé Mark who lives in Egypt and who are about to marry in May. Both of them dentists from Europe, Noreen wanted to surprise Mark, who is the one who normally carries out the surprises. She asked if she can have a flash mob organized at the airport, but mainly wanted to be surrounded by her friends. And she requested for a saxophonist as her husband loves jazz. And mark is all smiles and full of surprise when marhaba lays out the Winner 2 Jodin and her sisters surprised their mother Joy who lives in LA due to healthcare. Their mother has raised 6 children single-handedly; most of whom live in Dubai whilst she lives in LA. Whenever she comes to visit, approximately once a year, they book the marhaba service for her. Their mother was a music teacher and they wanted to honour her by singing a choir song for her as she comes through the arrivals section. Winner 3 Vinod surprised his wife and children who live in Ahmedabad. He nearly lost his wife due to kidney failure. His mother in-law donated a kidney, which has given her a new lease in life. He wanted to show her how much he loves her by showering her with red roses. Wouldn’t we love to be surprised by marhaba at the Dubai airport? Yes, but may be, we might have to wait for another competition of theirs! In case you are curious, marhaba offers airport meet and greet services in Dubai. They offer other services like Dubai sightseeing tours, baggage services, Airport Lounges, CityStop, Trade and Corporate Services and more. Welcome to BE ON THE ROAD Travel Blog! I am Sankara, its founder, a 30 something male from Bangalore who is living his dream of exploring the world and simultaneously trying to inspire others to live their dream. Wanna live your dream? Find Some inspiration here!
